Description:
As an Immigration consultant/counselor the job roles are as below:Identify the client immigration needs and give the most suitable recommendation.
Counsel clients on the Immigration Program that suits them the best.
Attend inbound and outbound calls to convert leads into prospects.
Revenue generation.
Conduct meetings to counsel prospects to their choice of immigration program.Skills
Skills:
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Should have sales experience preferably immigration industry.
Should be target oriented.
Should have a sound knowledge of the Immigration programs.
